,643 Other Communications 775 30,866 4,977 36,618 Miscellaneous 3,251 23,029 3,807 4,588 34,675 Jettisoned and unidentified 53 Total 4,964 1,083 97,937 39,717 683,605 14,430 55,283 310,288 1,096,794   ## p. 650 (#674) ############################################    ## p. 651 (#675) ############################################  Appendix 20 Tons of Bombs Dropped in the European Theater of Operations August 1942 to May 1945 Heavy Bomber Med/Lt Bomber Fighter All Types HE* Incendiary Total HE* Incendiary Total HE* Incendiary Total HE* Incendiary Total 1942 Aug 135 135 Sep 215 215 Oct 334 334 Nov 612 612 Dec 417 417 Total 1,713 1,713 135 135 215 215 334 334 612 612 417 417 1,713 1,713 1943 Jan 739 739 739 739 Feb 705 705 705 705 Mar 1,530 1,530 1,530 1,530 Apr 1,130 1,130 1,130 1,130 May 2,654 23 2,677 11 2,665 23 2,688 Jun 2,468 2,468 2,468 2,468 Jul 3,504 599 4,103 258 5 263 3,762 604 4,366 Aug 3,453 326 3,779 1,284 9 1,293 4,737 335 5,072 Sep 5,515 228 5,743 2,764 12 2,776 8,279 240 8,519 Oct 4,290 843 5,133 882 882 5,172 843 6,015 Nov 5,072 1,796 6,868 1,424 1,424 17 17 6,513 1,796 8,309 Dec 9,419 Total 40,479 6,973 47,452 3,158 12,577 1,530 1,530 7 7 10,956 3,158 14,114 8,153 26 8,179 24 24 48,656 6,999 55,655 1944 Jan 9,651 2,746 12,397 1,579 1,579 39 39 11,269 2,746 14,015 Feb 16,670 Mar 16,357 4,989 21,346 4,998 Apr 22,829 4,747 27,576 2,476 19,146 3,397 3,397 23 64 5,062 131 23 20,090 2,476 22,566 131 21,486 5,053 26,539 9,372 103 9,475 1,489 1,489 33,690 4,850 38,540 May 33,123 4,906 38,029 15,120 Jun 58,396 1,229 59,625 15,677 Jul 39,483 7,122 46,605 9,873 36 15,156 15,156 3,684 5 3,689 51,927 4,947 56,874 24 15,701 10,321 1 10,322 84,394 1,254 85,648 10 Aug 43,987 5,318 49,305 10,648 Sep 34,852 7,310 42,162 Oct 33,360 11,727 45,087 3,101 Nov 41,210 608 41,818 5,436 Dec 39,181 3,888 43,069 8,359 Total 389,099 57,066 446,165 93,272 1945 Jan 39,382 2,731 42,113 5,094 Feb 47,554 7,446 55,000 13,554 Mar 64,323 11,000 75,323 24,956 Apr 41,591 5,362 46,953 14,528 68
